questions.question: Because if you have a sufficiently broad definition of what a computer is, then everything is, right?
So as the universe expands and space gets bigger, are there more degrees of freedom?
So what kind of questions can science not currently answer may never be able to answer in your view?
And so the question is, at your own level, how do you prepare for these conversations?
And it may be a little bit broader, how can you advise other scientists to have these kinds of conversations?
